backend

Class Dice

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.Dice

  • public class Dice
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the dices of the monopoly game. There are three dices in monopoly and they have different features than the regular dice Implementation-Specific: There are three dices currentDice1 currentDice2 and Speed Dice. The combinations lead the dice different states which is updadet by Check Dice methods.
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Utku Evci

      • Dice

        public Dice(java.util.Scanner in)
        Constructor that creates an instance of a dice.
        Parameters:
        in - If the the game is in the debug mode than the Scanner reads the dice inputs when a dice rolled. If not in the debug mode, it can be null

    • Method Detail

      • rollTheDice

        public void rollTheDice()
        Roll the 3 dices and set them to a random values. Then calls the checkTheFaces function to update the state fields.
        Modifies:
        currentDice1 currentDice2 and speedDice fields of Dice and throwedInJail state-field.

      • rollDiceInJail

        public void rollDiceInJail()
        Roll the 2 dices and set them to a random values. Then calls the checkTheFaces function to update the state fields.
        Modifies:
        currentDice1 currentDice2 fields of Dice and throwedInJail state-field.

      • checkTheJailDice

        public boolean checkTheJailDice()
        Returns true if the rolled 2 dice have same value.

      • checkTheFaces

        public void checkTheFaces()
        Checks the faces of the dices and updates the states.
        Modifies:
        isTriple isDouble and isMrMonopolyMove fields.

      • rollDice

        public int rollDice(int max)
        Returns a random integer between 1 and MAX. If debugMode is true, than asks the value to the user.
        Parameters:
        max - the maximum value of the dice.
        Returns:
        a random integer within the interval.
        Requires:
        max>1 and max is integer.
